p: A total of 53 plant species belonging to 47 genera and 25 families were found in the vegetation and seed bank at the roadsides (RS) and the reference areas (RA). Of this total 33 were native species (62%), of which 23 are endemic (43%), and 20 are exotic species (38%). Of the exotic species, 12 are invasive (60%) ( Table 1). The most represented families were Asteraceae, Poaceae and Rosaceae, and the families with the highest number of exotic species were Asteraceae, with 6 species, and Poaceae with 4 ( Table 1).
